page.title: 12CALLINGTON COUNCIL HOUSES
page.content: There are 156 houses in Callington parish owned by{Caradon District {Council,}of which 131 are in square 9 of the block, as follows:- {20 flats}in{Coronation Road {11}in{Greenbank Terrace {13}in{Lower Coronation Terrace {17 flats}and{13 bungalows}in {Newport Close {14 houses}and{2 bungalows}in {Urban Terrace. Some properties are in traditional Cornish style, others have been rendered roughcast over stone or brick. All have bathrooms and gardens. A few homes are being purchased from Caradon by the tenants. {10'starter' homes}'for sale' are under construction for Caradon Council in Pollard Road.
